Resources
=========




#### Law Enforcement:

**For emergencies, call 911**, for any other incident that requires the response of a deputy; call [281-341-4665](tel:2813414665) (Fort Bend County Non-Emergency Number).

#### Fire:

Fire Protection is provided by the Fulshear-Simonton Fire Department

**Emergency:**Call 911  
**FSFD (Non-Emergency) Phone: [281-346-2800](tel:+12813462800)**  
**ESD#4 Phone: [281-533-0095](tel:+12815330095)**

##### Other Crisis Resources:

* [Suicide Prevention Lifeline](https://988lifeline.org/)   
  24-Hour Suicide Prevention Hotline  
  Phone: 800-273-TALK (8255) or 988
* [Child and Elder Abuse Hotline](https://www.txabusehotline.org/Login/Default.aspx)  
  24-Hour Abuse or Neglect Hotline  
  Phone: 800-252-5400
* [National Human Trafficking Hotline](https://humantraffickinghotline.org/)  
  24-Hour Human Trafficking Hotline  
  Phone: 888-373-7888 or text HELP or INFO to 233733
* [Fort Bend County Women’s Center](https://www.fbwc.org/)24-Hour Domestic Violence and Sexual Assault Crisis Hotline  
  Phone: 281-342-4357
* [National Domestic Violence Hotline](http://www.thehotline.org/)  
  24-Hour Domestic Abuse Hotline  
  Phone: 800-799-7233 or text LOVEIS TO 866-331-9474
* [Texana Behavorial Crisis Hotline](https://www.texanacenter.com/services/crisis-services/)24-Hour Behavioral Crisis Hotline  
  Phone: 800-633-5686
* [Texas Center for the Missing](https://centerforthemissing.org/)24-Hour Missing Persons Assistance  
  Phone: 713-599-0235
* [Veterans Crisis Line](https://www.veteranscrisisline.net/)  
  24-Hour Veteran Support Hotline      
  Phone: 1-800-273-8255 or text 838255 or Call 988 and Press 1

###### **Local Organizations**:

[Weston Lakes Property Owner’s Association](http://www.westonlakespoa.com/)

* Weston Lakes POA- [(281) 533-9108](tel:(281) 533-9108)
* Weston Lakes Subdivision Front Gate non-visitor issues- [(281) 533-0055](tel:(281) 533-0055)
* Weston Lakes Subdivision Front Gate Auto Attendant- [(844) 966-4070](tel:(844) 966-4070)
* Bowser Road (West Gate) Gatehouse Personnel – [(281) 533-4077](tel:2815334077)

281-341-8608

Email: [kp.george@fortbendcountytx.gov](mailto:kp.george@fortbendcountytx.gov)

Governor:  Greg Abbott  [www.gov.texas.gov](http://www.gov.texas.gov) Office of the Governor P.O. Box 12428  Austin, Texas  78711-2128     512-463-2000

Attorney General:  Ken Paxton   [www.texasattorneygeneral.gov](http://www.texasattorneygeneral.gov)   Office of the Attorney General P.O. Box 12548 Austin, Texas 78711-2548   phone 512-463-2100

Secretary of State:  Jane Nelson [www.sos.state.tx.us](http://www.sos.state.tx.us) for specific contact information please check website

Lt. Governor: Dan Patrick  [www.ltgov.state.tx.us](http://www.ltgov.state.tx.us)  email [LTGConstituent.Affairs@ltgov.texas.gov](mailto:LTGConstituent.Affairs@ltgov.texas.gov) 

Office of the Lt. Governor P.O. Box 12068 Austin, Texas 78711  Comment line: 512-463-5342  Office: 512-463-0001
